Matches Rocky's hand lock and sways back and forth like cobras, showing physical skill and readiness.
Repeats the mantra 'One step... one punch... one round... one fight' to maintain focus and mental discipline.
Ducks Rocky's slow but rhythmic jabs with the same rhythm, demonstrating timing and defensive skill.
Allows Rocky to place his hand on his shoulder for balance and support.
Shares his nervousness honestly with Rocky.
Continues to run drills with Rocky before the fight, showing preparation and focus.
Walks into the stadium slowly and stone-faced, showing controlled composure despite nerves.
Admits to being nervous and 'freaking out' before the fight.
Nods in agreement to Rocky's advice, stays focused and respectful during referee's instructions.
Eyes tighten in anger at Porter's insult but does not respond aggressively.
Nods and throws punches while staying loose during warm-up, showing focus and preparation.
Listens to Rocky's advice and uses the jab to keep opponent off, demonstrating tactical awareness.
Tries to counter Porter's attacks but gets pinned against the ropes, indicating some difficulty handling pressure.
Adonis acknowledges Porter's speed honestly and admits being shaken up.
Focuses on the fight and listens to Rocky's advice without complaint.
Ducks a left hook just in time and lands an uppercut to the body.
Stumbles after a fast jab and is overwhelmed by a barrage of punches.
Retreats and is pinned against the ropes, showing difficulty in regaining control.
Acknowledges opponent's speed and listens to Rocky's advice to be more aggressive.
Smiles at Porter and taunts him with friendly challenge 'Let’s go! Is that all you’ve got?'
Shows concern for Rocky after he falls and asks if he is okay.
Snaps and demands to continue fighting despite the bell, showing aggression and disregard for rules.
Bounces back to his feet after being knocked down, continues to fight aggressively despite injury and fatigue.
Throws wild swings leading to being knocked down, shows moments of recklessness.
Responds quickly with two hard straights after being hit, demonstrating skill and resilience.
Snaps and wants to continue fighting beyond the bell, risking disqualification or injury.
Listens to Rocky’s advice and shows concern for his coach, indicating awareness and respect.
Repeats Rocky's advice calmly: 'One punch at a time... One round at a time.'
Keeps fighting despite a still-open wound and swelling face.
Drops his hands while against the ropes, allowing Porter to land clean uppercut and body shots.
Knocks his gloves together in frustration after a tough round.
Nods to the referee indicating he is okay despite pain and bleeding.
Despite being swollen, bleeding badly, and having a worsening cut, Adonis continues to fight and attempts to slip his opponent, showing awareness of the opponent slowing down.
Adonis ignores Rocky's advice to focus on body shots and instead tries to slip Porter, which repeatedly results in him getting pinned against the ropes and pounded.

Adonis successfully lands a nasty straight shot and a bone-crunching hook to the body, doubling Porter over and following up with repeated body shots while tied up, demonstrating skill and tactical execution.

Adonis allows his wound to worsen during the fight, leading to increased bleeding and potential risk of fight cancellation, indicating a possible lack of effective damage control or corner management.
Looks at Bianca with wide eyes of recognition when Rocky turns his head towards her.
Quickly insists on finishing the fight despite Rocky's plea to stop for his own good.
Dodges the first couple of punches despite barely being able to see, but some punches connect and he is visibly hurt.
Quickly tells Rocky not to stop the fight, insisting he wants to finish despite his severe condition.
Shows wide-eyed recognition and emotional response when seeing Bianca ringside, indicating awareness and connection despite physical distress.
Refuses to quit despite being battered, shows determination to fight on.
Taunts opponent by baiting and provoking him in the ring.
Despite being battered and bruised, Adonis confidently decides to continue fighting and aims to knock out his opponent.
Uses strategic baiting by dropping his gloves and taunting Porter to provoke an opening.
Effectively parries opponent's quick jabs and counters with precise punches causing visible damage.
Maintains composure and confidence under pressure, showing mental toughness.
Lands a decisive right cross that sends Porter to the mat, showing effective striking and timing.
Recovers from being off balance by slipping a haymaker, ducking low, pivoting, and counterattacking with a precise four-hit combination, demonstrating skill and composure under pressure.
Engages in a wild brawl with Porter, swinging wildly which could indicate lack of control or strategy.
Embraces Rocky and Joe after winning, shares victory with loved ones, points to the heavens in gratitude.
Helps Rocky out of the van and supports him physically as he climbs the steps during chemo treatment.
Wins the fight by Technical Knockout and celebrates confidently with loved ones and mentors.
Shows physical resilience and readiness by bearing wounds and continuing to support Rocky.
Puts his hands around Rocky's shoulder to support him when Rocky is frustrated and struggling.
Encourages Rocky quietly with 'You got this... come on...'
Gives Rocky space after the climb, showing respect and understanding.
Supports Rocky emotionally and physically during a difficult moment, encouraging him quietly and helping him regain composure to finish the climb.
Steps back to give Rocky space after helping him, showing awareness and respect for others' needs.
